title: Proseminar on Literary Scholarship
description: This proseminar, regularly offered in the fall quarter, consists of seven or eight guest lectures by the literature faculty and introduces their research and methodologies. This proseminar is organized by a literature faculty member or the director of doctoral studies. The course is required in the first year of the Department of Literature doctoral program. Restricted to major code LT77 or consent of instructor and department.   Prerequisites:   department approval.
